Create a virtual reality simulation to train healthcare workers on how to administer vaccines in a safe and efficient manner.
Use machine learning algorithms to analyze large datasets of patient information to identify patterns that may indicate which individuals are at higher risk of developing the disease.
Develop a portable, handheld device that can rapidly test for the presence of the disease in individuals who present with symptoms.
Partner with local businesses to distribute free or low-cost vaccines to underserved communities.
Create a mobile app that allows individuals to track their vaccination status and receive reminders when it's time to get vaccinated again.
